trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: Motivation
trans-unit.target: 動機

trans-unit.source: When you grant someone privileged access to your systems, you extend your trust boundary to that person.
trans-unit.target: 當您將系統的特殊權限存取授與某人時，就是將您的信任界限延伸到該人員。

trans-unit.source: This is a risk -- administrators are an attack surface.
trans-unit.target: 這會帶來風險，因為系統管理員是受攻擊面。

trans-unit.source: Insider attacks and stolen credentials are both real and common.
trans-unit.target: 內部攻擊和認證遭竊是常見的真實情況。

trans-unit.source: This is not a new problem.
trans-unit.target: 這不是新問題。

trans-unit.source: You are probably very familiar with the principle of least privilege, and you might use some form of role based access control (RBAC) with applications that provide it.
trans-unit.target: 您可能很熟悉最低權限原則，並可能透過應用程式使用其提供的某種角色型存取控制 (RBAC)。

trans-unit.source: However, the effectiveness and manageability of these solutions are often limited by their broad scope and imprecision.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這些解決方案的效率和管理能力通常因其廣泛的範圍和不精確而受到限制。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, there are gaps in RBAC coverage.
trans-unit.target: 此外，RBAC 涵蓋範圍也有間隙。

trans-unit.source: For example, in Windows, privileged access is largely a binary switch, forcing you to give unnecessary permissions when adding users to the Administrators group.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 中，特殊權限存取主要是二元切換參數，迫使您在將使用者加入 Administrators 群組時，授與不必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Just Enough Administration (JEA) provides a RBAC platform through PowerShell Remoting.
trans-unit.target: Just Enough Administration (JEA) 透過 PowerShell 遠端提供 RBAC 平台。

trans-unit.source: It allows specific users to perform specific administrative tasks on servers without giving them administrator rights.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓特定使用者在伺服器上執行特定管理工作，而不需要授與系統管理員權限。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to fill in the gaps between your existing RBAC solutions, and simplifies management of those settings.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您填滿現有 RBAC 解決方案的間隙，並簡化這些設定的管理工作。

trans-unit.source: It is easy to expose give users more capabilities than you intend.

trans-unit.source: For example, `Set-ADUser` is an incredibly powerful and flexible command.

trans-unit.source: JEA runs in *No Language* mode which, among other things, prevents users from using variables.
trans-unit.target: 此外，JEA 會在 *NoLanguage* 模式下執行，以防止使用者使用變數。

trans-unit.source: In order to ensure that end users have a smooth experience, it's important to check for a few things.

trans-unit.source: The "-NewPassword" parameter requires a secure string.

trans-unit.source: Often, users create a secure string and pass it in as a variable (as below):
trans-unit.target: 通常，使用者會建立安全字串並傳入作為變數 (如下所示)︰

trans-unit.source: However, No Language mode prevents the usage of variables.
trans-unit.target: 不過，NoLanguage 模式會防止使用變數。

trans-unit.source: You can get around this restriction in two ways:
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過兩個方式來解決這項限制︰

trans-unit.source: You can require users run the command without assigning variables.
trans-unit.target: 您可以要求使用者執行命令，而不指派變數。

trans-unit.source: This is easy to configure, but can be painful for the operators using the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 這設定起來很容易，但對於使用端點的操作員可能很麻煩。

trans-unit.source: Who wants to type this out every time you reset a password?
trans-unit.target: 誰會想要在您每次重設密碼時輸入此命令？

trans-unit.source: You can wrap the complexity in a script or a function that you expose to end users.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過公開給使用者的指令碼或函式來掩飾此複雜性。

trans-unit.source: Scripts and functions that you expose run in an unrestricted context; you can write functions that use variables and call other commands without any issue.
trans-unit.target: 您公開的指令碼和函式會在不受限制的內容中執行；您可以撰寫函式來使用變數並呼叫其他命令，而不會發生任何問題。

trans-unit.source: The only downside is the cost of authoring and maintaining the function.

trans-unit.source: **NoLanguage Mode**: When PowerShell is in "NoLanguage" mode, users may only run commands; they cannot use any language elements.

trans-unit.source: Key Concepts Used Throughout This Guide
trans-unit.target: 本指南所使用的重要概念

trans-unit.source: **PowerShell Remoting**: PowerShell remoting allows you to run PowerShell commands against remote machines.
trans-unit.target: **PowerShell 遠端**：PowerShell 遠端可讓您對遠端電腦執行 PowerShell 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can operate against one or many computers, and use either temporary or persistent connections.
trans-unit.target: 您可以對一或多部電腦執行，並使用暫時或持續連線。

trans-unit.source: In this demo, you remoted into your local machine with an interactive session.
trans-unit.target: 在此示範中，您會使用互動式工作階段從遠端登入本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: JEA restricts the functionality available through PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: JEA 會限制可透過 PowerShell 遠端使用的功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about PowerShell remoting, run `Get-Help about_Remote`.
trans-unit.target: 如需 PowerShell 遠端的詳細資訊，請執行 `Get-Help about_Remote`。

trans-unit.source: **"RunAs" User**: When using JEA, a non-administrator "runs as" a privileged "Virtual Account."
trans-unit.target: **"RunAs" 使用者**︰使用 JEA 時，非系統管理員會以特殊權限「虛擬帳戶」身分執行。

trans-unit.source: The Virtual Account only lasts the duration of the remote session.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬帳戶只會持續到遠端工作階段期間結束為止。

trans-unit.source: That is to say, it is created when a user connects to the endpoint, and destroyed when the user ends the session.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，它會在使用者連線到端點時建立，並在使用者結束工作階段時摧毀。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Virtual Account is a member of the local Administrators group.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，虛擬帳戶是本機 Administrator 群組的成員。

trans-unit.source: On a domain controller, it is a member of Domain Admins.
trans-unit.target: 在網域控制站上，它是 Domain Admins 的成員。

trans-unit.source: Virtual Accounts are local to the machine on which they are created, and do not have permissions outside of that machine.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬帳戶是帳戶建立所在電腦上的本機帳戶，沒有該電腦以外的權限。

trans-unit.source: This means that they are not registered in Active Directory (no RID is assigned).
trans-unit.target: 這表示它們未登錄在 Active Directory 中 (未指派 RID)。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if an allowed command/script tries to access resources outside of the local machine, it will be accessing those resources under the machine's identity, not the Virtual Account identity.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果允許的命令/指令碼嘗試存取本機電腦以外的資源，它會使用電腦身分識別 (而不是虛擬帳戶身分識別) 來存取這些資源。

trans-unit.source: **"Connected" User**: The non-administrator user who connects to the JEA endpoint and to whom roles are assigned.
trans-unit.target: **「已連線」的使用者**︰連線到 JEA 端點且已指派角色的非系統管理員使用者。

trans-unit.source: Any commands this user runs are run under the context of the RunAs User or virtual account.
trans-unit.target: 這位使用者執行的任何命令，都會在 RunAs 使用者或虛擬帳戶的內容下執行。

trans-unit.source: On Blacklisting
trans-unit.target: 列入黑名單

trans-unit.source: After playing around with JEA, you may be wondering if it is possible to blacklist commands.
trans-unit.target: 試用 JEA 之後，您可能想知道它是否可以將命令列入黑名單。

trans-unit.source: This is an understandable request, but it is not currently planned for JEA for the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: 這是合理的要求，但目前不在 JEA 的規劃中，原因如下︰

trans-unit.source: We designed JEA to limit operators to only the actions they need to do.
trans-unit.target: 我們已將 JEA 設計為限制操作員只執行他們所需的動作。

trans-unit.source: A blacklist is the opposite.
trans-unit.target: 黑名單則相反。

trans-unit.source: PowerShell command authors did not design PowerShell commands with the JEA in mind.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 命令作者在設計 PowerShell 命令時並未考慮到 JEA。

trans-unit.source: On a fresh install of Windows Server 2016, there are about 1520 commands immediately available.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Server 2016 的全新安裝上，可立即使用的命令約有 1520 個。

trans-unit.source: The threat models for these commands did not include the possibility that a user would be running commands as a more privileged account.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令的威脅模式並未納入使用者以提升權限的帳戶身分執行命令的可能性。

trans-unit.source: For example, certain commands allow for code injection by design (e.g. Add-Type and Invoke-Command in the core PowerShell module).
trans-unit.target: 例如，特定命令可依設計插入程式碼 (例如核心 PowerShell 模組中的 Add-Type 和 Invoke-Command)。

trans-unit.source: JEA can warn you when you expose the specific commands we know about, but we have not re-assessed every other command in Windows based on the new threat model.
trans-unit.target: 當您公開我們已知的特定命令時，JEA 可能會警告您，但我們尚未根據新的威脅模式重新評估 Windows 中的所有其他命令。

trans-unit.source: You must understand the capabilities of the commands you exposing through JEA.
trans-unit.target: 您必須了解透過 JEA 公開之命令的功能。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, even if JEA blocked all commands with code-injection vulnerabilities, there is no guarantee that a malicious user would not be able to carry out a blacklisted action with another related command.
trans-unit.target: 此外，即使 JEA 封鎖了具有程式碼插入弱點的所有命令，也無法保證惡意使用者不會使用其他相關命令來執行列入黑名單的動作。

trans-unit.source: Unless you understand all of the commands that you are exposing, it is impossible for you to guarantee that a certain action is not possible.
trans-unit.target: 除非您了解要公開的所有命令，否則您無法保證不會發生特定動作。

trans-unit.source: The burden is on you to understand what commands you are exposing, whether they are using a whitelist or a blacklist.
trans-unit.target: 不論使用白名單或黑名單，您都有責任了解要公開哪些命令。

trans-unit.source: The number of commands a blacklist would expose is unmanageable, so JEA is implemented using whitelists instead.
trans-unit.target: 您無法管理黑名單會公開的命令數目，因此 JEA 會改用白名單實作。

trans-unit.source: Considerations When Limiting Commands
trans-unit.target: 限制命令時的考量

trans-unit.source: There is one important point to make about this step.
trans-unit.target: 此步驟還有一個值得提出的重點。

trans-unit.source: It is critical that all capabilities exposed through JEA are located in administrator-restricted areas.
trans-unit.target: 所有透過 JEA 公開的功能都必須位於系統管理員限制的區域中。

trans-unit.source: Non-administrator users should not have the capability to modify the scripts used through JEA endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 非系統管理員使用者不應該具有修改透過 JEA 端點使用之指令碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: On a related note, it is critical that you do not give JEA users the ability to overwrite JEA configurations and whitelisted scripts within their JEA sessions.
trans-unit.target: 另一個相關注意事項是，請務必不要讓 JEA 使用者可以覆寫 JEA 設定，以及將其 JEA 工作階段中的指令碼列入白名單。

trans-unit.source: Be extremely careful when exposing commands like `Copy-Item`!
trans-unit.target: 公開 `Copy-Item` 等命令時請格外小心！

trans-unit.source: You may run into a few common pitfalls into you go through this process yourself.

trans-unit.source: Here is a quick guide explaining how to identify and remediate these issues when modifying or creating a new endpoint:
trans-unit.target: 下列快速指南說明如何在修改及建立新端點時，找出並修正這些問題︰

trans-unit.source: Functions vs. Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: 函式與Cmdlet

trans-unit.source: PowerShell commands written in PowerShell are PowerShell Functions.
trans-unit.target: 以 PowerShell 撰寫的 PowerShell 命令是 PowerShell 函式。

trans-unit.source: PowerShell commands written as specialized .NET classes are PowerShell Cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 撰寫為特定 .NET 類別的 PowerShell 命令是 PowerShell Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You can check the command type by running `Get-Command`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行 `Get-Command` 來查看命令類型。

trans-unit.source: VisibleProviders
trans-unit.target: VisibleProviders

trans-unit.source: You will need to expose any providers your commands need.
trans-unit.target: 您必須公開命令所需的任何提供者。

trans-unit.source: The most common is the FileSystem provider, but you may also need to expose others, like the Registry provider.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的是檔案系統提供者，但您可能也需要公開其他提供者，像是登錄提供者。

trans-unit.source: For an introduction to providers, check out this [Hey, Scripting Guy blog post](http://blogs.technet.com/b/heyscriptingguy/archive/2015/04/20/find-and-use-windows-powershell-providers.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需提供者簡介，請參閱這篇 [Hey, Scripting Guy 部落格文章](http://blogs.technet.com/b/heyscriptingguy/archive/2015/04/20/find-and-use-windows-powershell-providers.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Be careful when exposing providers -- often, it is better to define your own function that works with the underlying providers than to directly expose the provider in a JEA session.
trans-unit.target: 公開提供者時請小心，通常最好是定義自己的函式來搭配基礎提供者使用，而不是直接公開 JEA 工作階段中的提供者。

trans-unit.source: This way, you can still allow users to work with files, registry keys, etc. but retain control over **which* files and registry keys they can work with using custom validation logic.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，您仍然可以允許使用者使用檔案、登錄機碼等，但會保留使用者可以使用自訂驗證邏輯處理 **哪些*檔案和登錄機碼的控制權。
